What is a formal method of evaluation and why do we need them?

A formal method of evaluation involves using rules and techniques to assess the structure and validity of arguments, ensuring clear thinking and logical consistency in reasoning. We need them to identify errors or weaknesses in arguments and improve our critical thinking skills.
